## **New Mexico LMSC SCY Records**

Updated March 10, 2024.

*Note: Openly available USMS records only date back to 2000. Working on getting older records of possible.*

```{r setup}
#| echo: false
#| message: false
source("process_records.R")
library(kableExtra)

```

### **Women's SCY Records**

```{r womens_records}
#| echo: false
##| paged-print: true
##| results: asis
#women's records
results_list <- list()
for(a in 1:length(agegroups)){
results_list[[a]] <- kbl(staterecords %>% filter(Sex=="Women ", Age.Group==agegroups[a]) %>%
        arrange(Stroke, Distance) %>% select(Stroke, Distance, Time, Name, Season), 
        caption = paste0("Women ",agegroups[a]))
}

results_list[[1]]
results_list[[2]]
results_list[[3]]
results_list[[4]]
results_list[[5]]
results_list[[6]]
results_list[[7]]
results_list[[8]]
results_list[[9]]
results_list[[11]]
results_list[[12]]
results_list[[13]]
results_list[[14]]
results_list[[15]]
#results_list[[16]]
```
